mapper.select: SELECT S.STUD_NUM, S.STUD_GRD , S.STUD_NM , S.STUD_QTR , S.STUD_BANK , S.STUD_ACT_NUM , S.STUD_DEPT , S.STUD_SCHREG_CODE , S.STUD_ADDR , D.DEPT_NM , C.COL_NM , T.TL_LCT , T.TL_POINT , T.TL_LEV , T.TL_MARK , L.LCT_CRD , L.LCT_YR , L.LCT_QTR, T.TL_ASMT_CHECK FROM STUDENT S,DEPARTMENT D,TL T,LECTURE L,COLLEAGE C WHERE S.STUD_NUM =#{stud_num} AND S.STUD_DEPT = D.DEPT_NUM AND S.STUD_NUM = T.TL_STUD AND T.TL_LCT = L.LCT_NUM AND D.DEPT_COL = C.COL_CODE AND L.LCT_YR = #{lct_yr}
